name: banglar-bhumi-utils
description: A chrome extension to improve functionality of the banglarbhumi.gov.in website.
author: Arpit Chakladar

scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=development webpack watch --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production webpack build --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=development webpack build --config config/webpack.config.js
